metadata.description: Name of the Azure storage account that contains the input/output data.
Location of the data factory. Currently, only East US, East US 2, and West Europe are supported.
Specify if you want to write curated data into SQL database.
The name of the SQL logical server.

serverName.defaultValue: Specify SQL server name if selected 'Yes'

metadata.description: The name of the SQL database.

databaseName.defaultValue: Specify SQL database name if selected 'Yes'

metadata.description: The administrator username of the SQL Server.

sqlAdministratorLogin.defaultValue: Specify administrator username of SQL server if selected 'Yes'

metadata.description: The administrator password of the SQL Server.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string ('covid_tracking'),
	runid as string ('runtime_guid')
}
source(output(
		Date as string,
		Region as string,
		New_Tests as string,
		Total_Tests as string,
		Positivity as string,
		Turn_Around as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'lineage') ~> sourceCSV
LoadDateAndISOCountry select(mapColumn(
		Load_Date,
		Load_Time,
		Record_Date = Date,
		Region,
		New_Tests,
		Total_Tests,
		Positivity,
		Turn_Around,
		Iso_Country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropLineageColumn
sourceCSV derive(Load_Time = substring(toString(currentTimestamp()), 12,25),
		Load_Date = currentDate(),
		Iso_Country = 'CAN') ~> LoadDateAndISOCountry
DropLineageColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkLatestCSV
DropLineageColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.jsonl'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestJsonl
DropLineageColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkCSV
DropLineageColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkJsonl
DropLineageColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestParquet
DropLineageColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkParquet
DropLineageColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkSQL
